summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'IMPLEMENTATION:AF4', 'cfNA', 'AF4', 'RESULTS:AF4' | Alignment-free filtering for cfNA fusion fragments | AF4 is an alignment free fusion detector that can work with RNA-seq data, cfRNA data and cfDNA data. It consists of two stages. In stage one, it identifies candidate fusion fragments and the corresponding fusion pairs. In the second stage, a list of filtering criteria are applied to narrow down the fusion candidates | This directory contains scripts we used internally to run benchmarks presented in the ISMB paper. It may or may not run in your environment | Method: AF4 decomposes each fragment into kmers and identifies for each kmer the corresponding genes | Edit util.py, especially DEFAULT_CACHE_DIR and DEFAULT_RESULT_DIR | Contact: saito@grail.com, xyang@grail.com
summary.name: grailbio
